overview: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" Fly High is the eighth stage play adaption of Haruichi Furudate's HaikyÅ«!! series. The play combines manga, live-play, and video to continue to challenge the "top" of theater and achieve further evolution.  This stage play ran during fall of 2019. The story covered the All-Japan Youth Training Camp and the Miyagi First Years' Training camp just ahead of the Spring Interhigh.
title: Hyper Projection Play "Haikyuu!!" Fly High
